name: Habrahabr Darkness (Old site)
description: Based on "Habrahabr & Geektimes & TM Tango theme" and including the latest fixes. This style is for an OLD VERSION of the site (https://habr.com/berserk-mode-nope) and will no longer be updated. If something will breaks, please give me to know by twitter or telegram: @valsaven Feel free to send your PR here: https://github.com/valsaven/userstyles Thanks to: incept0r, python273, iGusev, TotalCaesar659
additional_info:
Jun 7, 2021
~ Fix SVG URLs

Mar 19, 2021
~ Fix code background color in comments

Mar 17, 2021
~ Fix code background color

Nov 11, 2020
~ Fix ad background color

Nov 5, 2020
~ Fix code background color

Sep 21, 2020
~ Fix spoiler background

Aug 7, 2020
~ Fix News font color

Aug 5, 2020
~ Fix author info

Jul 28, 2020
~ Fix embed link color

Jun 23, 2020
~ Fix time of invitation color

Jun 3, 2020
~ Fix quotes background color

Apr 28, 2020
~ Fix company name color

Mar 30, 2020
~ Fix headers colors with NoScript

Mar 23, 2020
~ Fix max width of main wrapper
~ Fix colors in user comments
~ Fix colors in promo-block
~ Fix colors in timelines
- Remove outdated userstyles options

Nov 20, 2019
~ Fix colors of author card in post

Oct 20, 2019
~ Fix best companies colors
~ Minor color fixes

Oct 13, 2019
~ Fix sponsorship messages
~ Fix feed title menu
~ Fix news block colors

Sep 20, 2018
~ Fix post translation link color

Sep 17, 2018
~ Fix toggle menu background color

May 6, 2018
~ Fix hover link color

April 25, 2018
~ Fix Habrahabr/Geektimes domains
~ Fix user links

December 28, 2017
~ Fix blockquote and code blocks
~ Fix tracker page
~ Fix users page

December 27, 2017
~ Fix pre-moderation warning form
~ Fix comment folding level indicator 
~ Some additional fixes

December 26, 2017
~ Fix add comment form

December 18, 2017
~ Fix text colors on megamozg.ru

December 17, 2017
+ Add switcher for Ads displaying

October 30, 2017
~ Fix font colors in polls and author's name
